languages.text: "Я могу только попросить вас больше не предпринимать попыток взамодействовать с Глейто... подобным образом".
"I would only ask that you no longer try to... interact with Glaito in this way."
languages.original_text: "Я могу только попросить вас больше не предпринимать попыток взамодействовать с Глейто... подобным образом".

traits.locale_text: "I would only ask that you no longer try to... interact with Glaito in this way."
"I would only ask that you no longer try to... interact with Glaito in this way."
"I would only ask that you no longer try to... interact with Glaito in this way."
"I would only ask that you no longer try to... interact with Glaito in this way."
"I would only ask that you no longer try to... interact with Glaito in this way."
"I would only ask that you no longer try to... interact with Glaito in this way."

languages.text: 「ひとつだけお願いしたいのは…これ以上グライトとこのような形で関わろうとしないでいただきたい、ということです」
languages.original_text: "I would only ask that you no longer try to... interact with Glaito in this way."

traits.locale_text: 「ひとつだけお願いしたいのは…これ以上グライトとこのような形で関わろうとしないでいただきたい、ということです」

languages.text: "Ich würde Euch nur bitten, dass Ihr nicht länger versucht ... mit Glaito auf diese Weise zu interagieren."
languages.original_text: "I would only ask that you no longer try to... interact with Glaito in this way."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde Euch nur bitten, dass Ihr nicht länger versucht ... mit Glaito auf diese Weise zu interagieren."

languages.text: « J'aimerais qu'à l'avenir, vous évitiez... d'interagir de la sorte avec Glaito. »
languages.original_text: "I would only ask that you no longer try to... interact with Glaito in this way."

traits.locale_text: « J'aimerais qu'à l'avenir, vous évitiez... d'interagir de la sorte avec Glaito. »

languages.text: «Le rogaría que no intentase... interactuar con Glaito de ese modo».
languages.original_text: "I would only ask that you no longer try to... interact with Glaito in this way."

traits.locale_text: «Le rogaría que no intentase... interactuar con Glaito de ese modo».

languages.text: “我只能请求你，以后不要再尝试……以这种方式与格雷托互动。”
languages.original_text: "I would only ask that you no longer try to... interact with Glaito in this way."

traits.locale_text: “我只能请求你，以后不要再尝试……以这种方式与格雷托互动。”

languages.text: "Ancak sizden... Glatio ile bu şekilde etkileşime girmeye çalışmamanızı rica edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "I would only ask that you no longer try to... interact with Glaito in this way."

traits.locale_text: "Ancak sizden... Glatio ile bu şekilde etkileşime girmeye çalışmamanızı rica edeceğim."

languages.original_text: "I would only ask that you no longer try to... interact with Glaito in this way."
